duties_responsibilities.duty: Craft UX motion behaviors to guide and add delightful experience for users.
Define and implement the look and feel of products through motion design.
Produce motion studies for user flows and quickly iterate on multiple design solutions.
Craft thoughtful, innovative, elegant, and beautiful motion designs while rapidly producing rough idea sketches and perspectives to share with the team.
Follow, adapt, and evolve motion language and principles according to each design problem.
Communicate, defend, and build consensus around visual + motion definition and design direction.
Collaborate with software engineers to implement animation and motion concepts.
Understand the array of technical constraints, user goals, and business requirements that shape current and future products.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree in Interaction or Graphic Design, Motion, Communication Design, or a related design-related field, or at least 3 years of product design experience.
